resources.string: Malkin has a blend of size, speed and skill that makes him an offensive force; along with Sidney Crosby, he gives the Penguins a terrific one-two punch down the middle.

Tarasenko will be part of the Blues for a long time; they signed him to an eight–year contract in the summer of 2015 after he scored 37 goals in his breakout 2014–15 season and was chosen as a Second-Team All-Star.
Kucherov was a second-round pick (No. 58) by Tampa Bay in the 2011 NHL Draft, but he has played like a first-round talent.
